content:
how do you fix this warning from the QA?

ValueSet http://loinc.org not found by validator
get a URL for a proper value set. http://loinc.org is not a URL for a value set but the entire LOINC code system

I thought I had the right URL based on this...
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/loinc.html
Do you happen to know the right URL for the LOINC valueset?

Well, you could use http://loinc.org/vs. That is a value set that contains all LOINC codes. But are you sure that is what you want? It wouldn't really make sense, in a profile, to bind a code to all of LOINC.
